movies.title: Northern Soul
movies.plot: 'Northern Soul' is the story of a youth culture in the 1970s which changed a generation.It tells the tale of a nightclub based movement which developed in Northern England . The film is an authentic and uplifting account of two young boys whose horizons are opened up by the discovery of black American soul music. No longer satisfied with the prospect of a small town life and a factory production lin , they dream of going to America to discover super rare records which will help them become the best DJs on the Northern Soul scene. The difficult journey forces the two best friends to confront rivalry, violence and drug abuse as their friendship and loyalties are tested to the limit.
movies.simplePlot: Set in 1974, an authentic and uplifting tale of two friends whose horizons are opened up by the discovery of black American soul music.

biography.bio: Steve Coogan was born on October 14, 1965 in Middleton, Manchester, England as Stephen John Coogan. He is an actor and producer, known for Philomena (2013), Alan Partridge (2013) and Despicable Me 2 (2013). He was previously married to Caroline Hickman.
biography.name: Steve Coogan

biography.bio: Antonia Thomas was born on November 3, 1986 in London, England as Antonia Laura Thomas. She is an actress, known for Misfits (2009), Northern Soul (2014) and Sunshine on Leith (2013).
biography.name: Antonia Thomas

biography.bio: Ricky Tomlinson was born on September 26, 1939 in Bispham, Blackpool, England as Eric Tomlinson. He is an actor and writer, known for Brookside (1982), Mike Bassett: England Manager (2001) and The Royle Family (1998). He has been married to Rita Cumiskey since January 4, 2003. He was previously married to Marlene Clifton.
biography.name: Ricky Tomlinson

biography.bio: James Lance was born on September 29, 1975 in the UK. He is an actor and writer, known for Northern Soul (2014), Bronson (2008) and Marie Antoinette (2006).
biography.name: James Lance

biography.bio: Elliot James Langridge was born on September 5, 1987 in Kingston upon Thames, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Northern Soul (2014), Let's Be Evil (2016) and Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007).
biography.name: Elliot James Langridge

biography.bio: Christian McKay was born in 1973 in Bury, Lancashire, England. He is an actor, known for Rush (2013), The Theory of Everything (2014) and Me and Orson Welles (2008). He has been married to Emily Allen since 2013.
biography.name: Christian McKay

biography.bio: Alex Esmail is an actor, known for Attack the Block (2011), Northern Soul (2014) and Essex Boys Retribution (2013).
biography.name: Alex Esmail

biography.bio: John Thomson was born on April 2, 1969 in Salford, Lancashire, England as Patrick Francis McAleer. He is an actor and writer, known for The Curse of the Were-Rabbit (2005), 24 Hour Party People (2002) and Cold Feet (1997). He has been married to Samantha Sharp since May 2005. They have one child.
biography.name: John Thomson

biography.bio: Jack Gordon is an actor, known for Northern Soul (2014), Fish Tank (2009) and Captain America: The First Avenger (2011).
biography.name: Jack Gordon

biography.bio: Josh Whitehouse is an actor, known for Mr. Burberry (2016), Northern Soul (2014) and To Trend on Twitter (2017).
biography.name: Josh Whitehouse

biography.bio: Lisa Stansfield was born on April 11, 1966 in Rochdale, Lancashire, England as Lisa Jane Stansfield. She has been married to Ian Devaney since July 25, 1998. She was previously married to Augusto Grassi.
biography.name: Lisa Stansfield

biography.bio: Emily Aston was born on February 26, 1982 in Rossendale, Lancashire, England as Emily Jane Aston. She is an actress, known for Dead Man's Shoes (2004), Millions (2004) and Butterfly Kiss (1995).
biography.name: Emily Aston

biography.bio: Dylan Brown is an actor, known for Unleashed (2005), Centurion (2010) and Three Kings (1999).
biography.name: Dylan Brown

biography.bio: Claire Garvey is an English actress. Garvey grew up in Chesterfield, Derbyshire. Her father was a Coal Miner while her mother was a Nurse and they have been happily married for over 30 years. She has one younger brother. After St Mary's RC School, Garvey attended St Martins Lancaster to read Drama and Ethics and graduated with a 2:1. While studying Drama, she appeared in plays, including Anthony's Nielsons, Stitching in which she played the title role, and, the Changeling at the Dukes theatre. After studying Garvey took a gap year to travel around the world and whilst in India found herself in a Bollywood movie. Shortly after moving to London she got her debut Independent Feature Film along side Sylvia Symms, 'Booked Out', which was Directed by Bryan O'Neill. She has since gone on to play the supporting female role in Elaine Constantine's debut Feature Film 'Northern Soul' which is due for release next year.
biography.name: Claire Garvey

biography.bio: Ashley Taylor Dawson was born on January 11, 1982 in Cheshire, England. He is an actor, known for Hollyoaks (1995), Northern Soul (2014) and StarStreet (2001).
biography.name: Ashley Taylor Dawson

filmingLocations.location: Bentley Lane, Bury, Greater Manchester, England, UK
